В то время как первая часть серии сделала революцию в жанре FPS, вторая часть совершила революцию в игровой индустрии в целом и говорить про её заслуги можно очень долго, но я постараюсь быть краток.
Чтобы понять почему я считаю эту игру одной из лучших в истории игровой индустрии стоит всего лишь вернуться в прошлое в 2004 год и поиграть в игры, которые были до HL2, вообще в любые, а потом пройти непосредственно данное творение. Перечислю вкратце какие новшества для игровой индустрии были привнесены:
- Мощнейшая атмосфера антиутопии, какую на момент выхода можно было испытать лишь в шедеврах литературы подобного жанра книг известных на весь мир писателей.
- Самая продвинутая физика окружения, которая до сих пор превосходит по возможности взаимодействия многие ААА проекты, выходящие уже в современное время.
- Немыслимые масштабы сюжетных событий, которые нам предлагают на собственном опыте пережить, сравнить могу разве что с просмотром трилогии Властелина Колец.
- Огромное количество всевозможных механик взаимодействия с миром, обширный арсенал оружия, противников и всевозможных игровых ситуаций, в которых игроку предлагают оказаться.
Я бы мог ещё долго перечислять заслуги данного произведения, но лучше просто скажу, что это не игра, это революция, поднявшая планку ожиданий игроков от игрового опыта на недостижимый и доселе уровень.

This is my favourite videogame of all time, (not because i am old).
This is because when i was 8 or 9 i found the orange box on the Xbox 360 for £4 in a second hand shop on the day that my dad dragged me to his office. I only had access to an Xbox 360 so my interest already peaked, with a new game to try which wasn't the 600th playthrough of Skylanders Giants.
The first game i played on the orange box was portal 1 (i found it too hard so i rage quit).
So i then played Half life 2, i never played the first game because i did not own a computer, but out of my thirst for entertainment, i played it.
It was my first ever fps game that i played (apart form Halo 4 which was crap), on my first run of the game i was overjoyed with happiness to find a game that played differently to Skylanders and Lego batman 2.
Because i was 9 i didn't understand the story, but i could tell that it was good anyway.
I put it on easy mode because i thought it was going to be as mentally challenging as Portal 1.

On my second playthough i found that i could understand the story much better than before and i enjoyed it. The mysteries of the G-man, and where Dr. Wallace Breen is now from getting his "host body" and the complexity of the Vortigaunt hive mind. It was alot more enjoyable to the point i could actually tell my friends about how good a game that isn't FIFA is without them being bored.
Also by this point i upped the difficulty to normal so i would have more of a challenge and also more fun with it.

And to this day i have played this game countless times and played over 200 other games but this game is still my favourite, simply for its nostougia, its story. And, its impact on my life.
Go play it for yourself

después de haber jugado y terminado el primer half-life tengo que admitir que este.. ¡¡me encanto mas que el primero!!, las nuevas mecánica, los nuevos enemigos, los nuevos escenarios y las físicas hacen que este juego sean mejor que el anterior, ademas que hay un nivel donde se juega de noche y le da un aire de terror y supervivencia muy bueno, sinceramente disfrute jugar este juego mas que el primero ya que había un bicho que me impidió poder completar el primer half-life, pero aqui ya no es problema ya que el nuevo modelo de los barnacle me agrada mas y ya no me da miedo, este juego vale cada centavo y definitivamente ¡vale tenerlo en tu biblioteca de steam totalmente! es un juegazo que no te puedes perder! 10/10

I don't know how Valve did it, but the facial animations even after 17 years still looks amazing. Also Kelly Bailey's performance with the soundtrack is just absolutely perfect, the crown jewel of the OST being Lab Practicum, for obvious reasons. And evermore with Laidlaws's writing and the game's world space and visuals, Half Life 2 has stood the test of time.

Half-Life 2 is a game that was both the best thing I ever saw since sliced bread. and the scariest thing I ever saw since I almost died to a big rock in 2nd grade. After COMPLETING the game, It's about time I edited this review a bit....

Graphics:
For a game released in 2004, the graphics are comparable to Skyrim, as in they're really good.

Gameplay:
DAMMIT I LOVE USING THE GRAVITY GUN SO MUCH! YOU CAN CUT ZOMBIES IN HALF!!!!

Enemies:
I fucking hate Fast Zombies. they scared the absolute shit out of me when I first encountered one.... aside from that, I don't have a problem with the enemies...

Characters: 
In almost every one to two chapters at the start of the game, You meet new characters left and right, it's CRAZY....

Levels:
Very nice.... except the levels from Chapter 4, while I like the boat gameplay, I hate having to GET OUT of the boat and having NO IDEA WHERE THE HELL I'M SUPPOSED TO GO!!!

Mods:
Eh, the mods these days are HD mods, funny mods, and graphical improvements....

ENDING:
THIS SECTION CONTAINS SPOILERS....



damnit i love the Blue Gravity Gun. you basically become god.
oh yeah, and G-Man is kinda hot so 100/10
also screw Dr. Breen.

ALSO....

the credits theme is a banger.

FINAL RANKING:
Graphics: 5/5
Gameplay: 4/5
Enemies: 4/5
Characters: 5/5
Levels: 3/5
Mods: 3/5
ENDING: 10/5 (Yes I can do this, shut up.)
FINAL SCORE:  34/30
Final Thoughts:
